name: Flip Out! (DeltaF1)
description:
A very short game I made for Ludum Dare 30. The ludum dare link has some additional information for the debug tools.

Flip Out! is a platformer, with a similar mechanic to the game Ibb and Obb where gravity doesn't always behave how it should. I created it in a limited time frame, but overall I'm happy with the result. I wish I could have made levels, but I ran out of time.

Use the arrow keys to move, and ~ to enter debug mode. There are instructions on the previously mentioned ludum dare page for level editing and saving.
